subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[evil]]; [[wicked]]; [[treacherous]]
# [[evildoer]]; [[treacherous]] person
# to [[stage]] an [[armed]] [[rebellion]] or to [[steal]]
# [[traitor]]; [[betrayer]]
# to [[commit]] [[adultery]]
# [[extramarital]] [[affair]]; [[adultery]]
# to [[rape]]
# {{lb|zh|Zhangzhou|&|Taiwanese|_|Min Nan|vulgar}} to [[fuck]] (alternative form: [[幹]])
